text: Lekin unhon ney phir kaha kay aey humaray perwerdigar! Humaray safar door daraz ker day chunkay khud unhon ney apnay hathon apna bura kiya iss liye hum ney unhen (guzishta) fasano ki soorat mein ker diya aur unn kay tukray tukray ura diye bila shuba her aik sabar-o-shukar kerney walay kay liye iss (maajray) mein boht si ibraten hain
